front.title: Source Address Validation enhances its security using blockchain

abstract.t: The new Source Address Validation(SAV) mechanism must not introduce additional security vulnerabilities or risks, and the SAV mechanism should ensure the integrity and trusted origin of the protocol packets that deliver the required SAV information. This document explores the use of blockchain technology to enhance the security of the SAV mechanism itself without modifying existing protocols to ensure the accuracy of the generated SAV rules.
